bug.short_desc: vulkan package should recommend or require mesa-vulkan-drivers
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: Without mesa-vulkan-drivers, vulkaninfo is not useful.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): vulkan-1.0.30.0-1.fc25.x86_64
How reproducible: always â€“ packaging
Steps to Reproduce: 1. have neither mesa-vulkan-drivers nor vulkan installed 2. install vulkan 3. have a look at dependencies during installation
Actual results: mesa-vulkan-drivers is not being pulled in as dependency
Expected results: mesa-vulkan-drivers is required for vulkan to work properly and thus should be installed.
